app.title: Node Explorer
app.subtitle: Visualize and navigate the hierarchical structure

home.no_items: No items found in this folder.

delete_node.title: Delete Node?
delete_node.description: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete this node?
delete_node.has_children: Cannot delete a node that contains subnodes. Please delete the subnodes first.

create_node.title: Create Node
create_node.description: Create a new node in the current location. Provide names in both English and Spanish.
